lyrics.stanza: In Matthew's house and at his table, Jesus was there to eat with all the sinners. Strong ones don't need a physician, He came for those who are ill.
Then Jesus went to visit, To teach and preach and heal. To shepherd all the lost ones, Compassion He did feel.
In Matthew's house and at his table, Jesus was there to eat with all the sinners. Strong ones don't need a physician, He came for those who are ill.
Jesus said to His disciples: The harvest is great but the workers are so few! Pray to the Lord of the harvest To send out workers, yes, do!
